These guys get it! 🙏

We are building a long-term position in $FXN and believe @protocol_fx offers a unique, and more importantly a *viable*, approach to solving a core DeFi problem… The issue of safely storing value. Storing value in both USD and ETH offer different but ultimately terminal problems. USD necessarily loses value to inflation over time and ETH is hyper-volatile which exposes extreme short-term loss of value. Storing value in stables like USDC/USDT or their derivatives DAI, FRAX, etc. are no different than storing value in USD as they are cash/treasury backed making them inherently centralized.

fETH (the real star) and fxUSD offer unique solutions to this problem. fETH is a volatility smoothed stablecoin pegged to and collateralized by ETH. Volatility smoothing of 10% = $1000 move in ETH = $100 move in fETH. Eliminating the risk of loss due to hyper-volatility while still allowing you to store value in ETH which is inherently deflationary. fxUSD is a dollar pegged stablecoin collateralized by LSD ETH, offering a fundamentally stronger backing than stables that are collateralized by cash/treasuries.

The people at @aladdindao really ‘get it’ in terms of the importance of decentralization and actualizing the DeFi ethos and we believe that F(X) protocol offers a core DeFi innovation. The protocol currently takes in >100% of its $5M market cap in revenue, which is exactly the type of asymmetrical play we look for. Our plan is to buy FXN from $100 down to $50, stake it on Convex for ~40% APR, and either hold it to 0 or sell it as the market cap approaches $1B.

New updates to Spark's MetaMorpho Vault and SparkLend are now live on @MakerDAO’s Governance Portal ⚡

Following recent suggestions from @phoenixlabsdev on the Maker Forum and parameter recommendations by @BlockAnalitica, three proposed changes are now open for voting.

If approved, these updates will be included in an upcoming Executive Vote:

Update on Spark’s MetaMorpho Vault supply caps

Due to a recent surge in user demand for sUSDe collateral pools, it is recommended to adjust the pool capacities. This proposal aims to align the capacities of sUSDe pools with their USDe counterparts.

• Increase the sUSDe 91.5% LLTV pool supply cap to 200 million DAI.

• Increase the sUSDe 86% LLTV pool supply cap to 500 million DAI.

Onboard USDC.e as a borrowable asset on Gnosis Chain

Gnosis Chain has introduced a new USDC token, USDC.e. In the coming months, all USDC activity on the chain is expected to migrate to this new version.

To ensure continued access to Gnosis Chain's USDC liquidity, this proposal recommends listing the new USDC.e token on SparkLend.

Update USDC parameters to prepare for offboarding

As users transition to the new USDC.e token, the older USDC version on Gnosis Chain will likely experience reduced support and decreased on-chain liquidity.

To manage this change, a phased retirement of the old USDC token from the Gnosis Chain SparkLend market is recommended.

New proposals are now open for voting on the Maker Governance Portal.

Following @phoenixlabsdev's latest suggestions on the Maker Forum, three active polls are now open for voting on proposed changes to Spark’s MetaMorpho Vault, and SparkLend.

[Mainnet] Update Spark’s MetaMorpho Vault Supply Caps

Due to the recent shift in demand towards sUSDe collateral pools, and based on @BlockAnalitica's recommendation, this proposal aims to increase the capacity in sUSDe pools to match their USDe counterparts:

• Increase the sUSDe 91.5% LLTV pool supply cap to 200 million DAI

• Increase the sUSDe 86% LLTV pool supply cap to 500 million DAI

[Gnosis] Onboard USDC.e as a Borrowable Asset

Gnosis Chain has introduced USDC.e, a new USDC token complying with Circle’s standards. Over the next few months, all USDC activity on the chain will transition to this version.

To maintain access to USDC liquidity on Gnosis Chain, it's recommended to list the new USDC.e token on SparkLend.

Initial parameters for USDC.e are detailed in the forum post: https://t.co/XSUN0oAycV

[Gnosis] Update USDC Parameters to Prepare for Offboarding

On-chain liquidity for the old version of USDC on Gnosis Chain is expected to decline in the coming months as usage transitions to the new USDC.e token.

To address this shift and protect user experience, a gradual deprecation of the old USDC token from the Gnosis Chain SparkLend market has been proposed.

If approved, these changes will be included in an upcoming Executive Vote.

Check the active polls on the Maker Governance Portal: https://t.co/WQp5OEmAZ7

How does the Ethernity #Layer2 DRM contribute to a more sustainable environment?👇

Every time a collection is deployed on the Ethernity Chain, the DRM (Digital Rights Management) control extracts the image signature to verify if it has already been processed, generating an Authenticity Confidence rating. 

This means the engine does not use computing power to process a duplicate image, saving energy and the environment.

RT @phtevenstrong: Late Night Yield Highlight: Frax Bond Looping

This one's for the little guys

TL;DR: 42% APR On Stables for leveraging bonds

Right now on @fraxfinance you can borrow against FXB20251231 at 90% LTV.

That's 10x possible leverage on a bond that expires Dec 31st, 2025.

And you can currently buy this bond for 0.88 FRAX on @CurveFinance. 

That's a 13.64% ROI to maturity. 

Or, 9.07% annualized.

IT SHOULD BE NOTED that there's only $100K in FRAX to borrow. However, these markets are influenced by Frax and new FRAX can be added through governance.

That means a $10K position at 9x leverage would push utilization to 80%. That would increase the interest rate from 1% to 4.92%.

I made a calculator for this because I'm a nerd.

IT SHOULD ALSO BE NOTED, these bonds, while maturing 1:1 with FRAX are like Pendle PTs. They can vary in value between now and expiry depending on market conditions.

So, at 90% LTV (9x Leverage) you could experience a 7% decline in price on your fraxbond collateral before experiencing liquidation. 

OF COURSE, the real play might just be adding liquidity for these bonds on Curve, where the APRs currently range from 33% to 86% APR depending on the market.

Finally, if you've never used the Fraxtal chain before, then you may wonder how to bridge there.

Frax uses their proprietary "Fraxtal Bridge" to allow users to send over a variety of assets quickly and efficiently:
https://t.co/a6xtX8KpX1

Please note: I'm a Fraxtal Ambassador, so I'm biased. But I genuinely do think that there are some good plays on Fraxtal for the stablecoin connoisseur looking to diversify.

RT @phtevenstrong: I like @SiloFinance. 
I like @RenzoProtocol.
Let's get 70% APR on ETH.

Step 1: get PT ezETH on @pendle_fi (7.8% Fixed APR)
Step 2: deposit into @FactorDAO's leveraged Silo Vault

Done. It's that simple. 

So what's happening on the backend?

This vault deposits the PT asset into Silo, borrows ETH against it, converts to more PT, and repeats the process.

This allows you to get up to 4.5x leverage on the PT.

By itself, this would generate 12.5% APR given the current borrow rate on Silo.

However, Factor got a large ARB grant relative to its TVL.

So depositors are also earning 42% in ARB incentives.

They're also earning 7.73% in "scale incentives."

What are Scale incentives? AFAIK, they're just a fancy way of saying $FCTR incentives.

So your total APR comes out to 72.3%.

THAT SAID, there are some things to consider.

1) Factor is a 27M TVL protocol. Low TVL implies some inherent riskiness that many people are not comfortable with.

2) This vault only has $350K TVL. That means large deposits will dilute this opportunity.

3) You are beholden to borrow rates. If a large leverager borrows a lot of ETH, they may spike the cost to borrow over the fixed yield of the PT, making the core strategy negative thereby making it entirely dependent on the emissions for positive yield.

DO NOTE: you can change your leverage, repay your debt, add collateral, etc once you open a position. Claiming your incentives is also remarkably easy.

Disclaimer: I'm Silo and Renzo ambassador 🫡 so please know I have a bias in finding and elevating the best related opportunities for both teams.

Pendle

感谢 @pendle_fi 四月小姐 @Aprilzz423 的暖心鸡汤图：「来年回首一看、一切如常、市场的永恒就是盲目狂欢与极度恐慌来回穿梭」

长文：现在剖析一下6月一波PT集中到期对TVL的影响
关于积分市场、以及后续前景、下代产品的看法

✼✼✼✼✼

首先，6月到期日已接近一周，直到昨天才忽然大量媒体集中转载关于TVL的「新闻」🙃 然后配合一波推低币价，难保不是有心人操控市场的行为？🤔

✼✼✼✼✼

我对Pendle TVL的看法是，Pendle(V2)是固定利率结构产品，到期日就是设计的本身：有到期日才有YT的高杠杆、有YT的高杠杆PT作为对手方赚得更高的固定收益

Pendle(V2)的PT／YT市场就是TradFi的债券市场和期权市场：产品原本就有到期日、需要到期置换的市场：那TVL不连贯也是很正常的事

就有如一批美债6月到期了，那就要怕美债TVL暴跌了吗？ 又例如6月美股的月结期权到期，那就要怕没人再玩期权了吗？

只要一直提供更多不同月份的PT和YT
到机会出现的时候、资金自动会再进来博奕
与债券／期权市场同理，资金总是侍机而动

另一方面不难看出，PT利率也是一种Long pays Short的funding rate ：牛要起飞时，杠杆(积分)需求自然会上升
到时候PT这种空方资费收益也会上升

✼✼✼✼✼

目前币圈低迷的市况，周围无论是期货市场的funding rate、或是借贷市场的利率都一样在下降，并不是 PT 利率独有的情况。除非你相信牛市已死 （牛已死的话本来全网所有TVL和收益也会下降），否则总有一天各种利率会春天还会回来，PT的收益也一样

二三月的200% PT收益率是一种fomo的疯狂
那5%几乎贴钱送积分的PT又何尝不是一种极致恐慌
我们倒是要想想到底overcrowed的是哪一边？

别忘了你也能提供Pendle LP躺平挖奖励：Pendle LP（非ZPI模式）持到期币本位IL为零、本金无损。资金在外面现在也很难找到什么更好而又同等安全系数的机会，TVL还是也会慢慢回来的

✼✼✼✼✼

TVL也并不就简单主宰协议收入
无论是进场离场的买卖也能产生交易收入
只要有收益机会出现
资金还是会涌入争夺那些收益机会、并产生交易收入，YT也是一样

事实上，过去一周协议的交易费收入，比起之前一两周差不多高出一倍

还有到期忘了赎回PT产生的利息收益、YT的3％收益(包括积分!)抽成，都持续在为vePENDLE持有人产生现金流

✼✼✼✼✼

喔，顺便一提
Pendle是现在DeFi少数低排放仍然能吸纳大量TVL的协议

$PENDLE ＊不是＊你那些VC解锁币、高通胀币、高FDV低流通币、 $PENDLE 已经完全团队/VC解锁
排放通胀率年化只有5％左右、并每周持续减产

代币还有超过15％被永久黑洞锁进生态项目Penpie、Equilibria、StakeDAO国库里
近几期的vePENDLE收益年化仍然能达到20-30% (只要投票策略不太烂)

哦对了，上面提到YT也有抽成积分利益
那么Pendle也能拿到各个项目的空投不是吗？所以… ㊙️👀

✼✼✼✼✼

那积分市场还有戏吗？

所谓的积分市场就是空投市场，就算积分的主导权在项目方手上，但像ZRO ZK Blast空投又何尝不是由项目方主导一切。相反积分在这基础上增加了绝对的透明度，也比盲盒空投更能产生用户深入的应用

而且，每次空投都永恒有各种Fud各种不满，但每次空投币圈仍然是乐此不疲去挖，穿越多个周期周而复始的空投预期仍然是币圈最受注目最高人气的Alpha。积分也将如是，都只不过是牛熊景气循环的高山低谷而已

眼下，还有BTC再质押／二层的赛道未完全开打，要是相反牛没有死，空投预期终究会归来

至于目前上架的再质押LRT、Ethena市场还会有人买YT吗？LRT项目和Eigenlayer之后，后续还有Eigenlayer的一大票AVS项目有空投可能，AVS收益上线后，LRT的YT也将能押注杠杆AVS收益。Ethena的YT也将能用来押注杠杆市场Funding Fee收入

✼✼✼✼✼

Pendle(V2)除了积分市场就没其他了吗？

至于Pendle，积分市场也不是唯一答案。目前团队的大多数资源已经投入在"V3"的开发中，上次本VinC分享关于V3的Alpha因为太过赤裸所以文章已经「被消失」了。但可以再说的是，"V3"并不是目前Pendle V2的一个的迭代，而是新的产品线、新的途事，初版并将强攻一个尚未被广泛谈论、但又是整个币圈基石的市场

我姑且叫这新产品"X" （名字是我作的）

积分转眼间也已玩了半年了
"X"可能在你没及留意的一息间就要来到了

Pendle由第1天开始就没有特别所谓的赛道
只要有收益资产、只要有「互道傻B」的搏奕、只要有需要互换的利率风险，就能有Pendle
Pendle is AnyFi
V3之后更无链上链下或哪个链的限制

And you are not ready for it
就像一年前上了币安，有人说上所即高点、说利率赛道那已经是巔峰了
一年前LST赛道炒热，有人说LST炒完后就没戏了
去年7－10月的洗盘，把绝大部份人的刷掉
The rest is history

✼✼✼✼✼

比起寻找最好的技术分析、寻找最好的代币模型、寻找最好的赛道…

我更重视找到最好的团队

一支经历整个02 03年周期低谷再浴火重生、一而再而三建造优良产品、无论技术、执行力、BD、市场、社区都是AA级的团队

这可不是那些赛道塞满人、clone了又clone没真正用家只能挖提卖的九流项目

你以为你投对的是赛道
其实你要投对的是团队

什么才是最大的Alpha本身，早就平白放在你面前、反复地验证了
剩下只有你有没有把握一个问题而已

✼✼✼✼✼

后话

眼光也要拉阔拉远点
目前币市整体走势跑输大部份风险资产
资金正往美股尤其是大型股躺尸

整体加密表现没看到改善之下
Pendle在DeFi／Alt市场里全年仍然是大幅跑赢BTC ETH的一支、但也不要天真得眼里只看到Pendle涨跌就是你的整块森林… 

强如英伟达也在2022年跌个66%才涨10倍

A pendulum forever swings between unsustainable optimism and unjustified pessimism.

Trust yourself, trust the team, trust @tn_pendle's hair.
Relax and @pendle_fi on. 

「你永远不能低估一颗冠军的心」
